navigators.smart.paxosatwar.roles
Class Acceptor

java.lang.Object
  navigators.smart.paxosatwar.roles.Acceptor

public class Acceptor
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the acceptor role in the paxos protocol. This class work together with the TOMulticastLayer class in order to supply a atomic multicast service.

Author:
Alysson Bessani

          This class is a data structure for a propose that was accepted

deliver

public final void deliver(PaxosMessage msg)
Called by communication layer to delivery paxos messages. This method only verifies if the message can be executed and calls process message (storing it on an out of context message buffer if this is not the case)

Parameters:
msg - Paxos messages delivered by the comunication layer

processMessage

public final void processMessage(PaxosMessage msg)
Called when a paxos message is received or when a out of context message must be processed. It processes the received messsage acording to its type

Parameters:
msg - The message to be processed

proposeReceived

public void proposeReceived(Round round,
                            PaxosMessage msg)
Called when a PROPOSE message is received or when processing a formerly out of context propose which is know belongs to the current execution.

Parameters:
msg - The PROPOSE message to by processed

executeAcceptedPendent

public boolean executeAcceptedPendent(int eid)
Called by the delivery thread. Executes the next accepted propose.

Parameters:
eid - Consensus's execution ID
Returns:
True if there is a next value to be proposed and it belongs to the specified execution, false otherwise

Called when a WEAK message is received

computeWeak

private void computeWeak(int eid,
                         Round round,
                         byte[] value)
Computes weakly accepted values according to the standard PaW specification (sends STRONG/DECIDE messages, according to the number of weakly accepted values received).

Parameters:
eid - Execution ID of the received message
round - Round of the receives message
value - Value sent in the message

decideReceived

private void decideReceived(Round round,
                            int a,
                            byte[] value)
Called when a DECIDE message is received. Computes decided values according to the standard PaW specification

Parameters:
round - Round of the receives message
a - Replica that sent the message

scheduleTimeout

public void scheduleTimeout(Round round)
Schedules a timeout for a given round. It is called by an Execution when a new round is created.

Parameters:
round - Round to be associated with the timeout

timeout

public void timeout(Round round)
This mehod is called by timertasks associated with rounds. It will locally freeze a round, given that is not already frozen, its not decided, and is not removed from its execution

Parameters:
round -

freezeReceived

private void freezeReceived(Round round,
                            int a)
Called when a FREEZE message is received.

Parameters:
round - Round of the receives message
a - Replica that sent the message

doFreeze

private void doFreeze(Round round)

computeFreeze

private void computeFreeze(Round round)
Invoked when a timeout for a round is triggered, or when a FREEZE message is received. Computes wether or not to locally freeze this round according to the standard PaW specification

Parameters:
round - Round of the receives message
value - Value sent in the message

createProof

private FreezeProof createProof(int eid,
                                Round r)
Creates a freeze proof for the given execution ID and round

Parameters:
eid - Consensus's execution ID
r - Round of the execution
Returns:

decide

private void decide(Round round,
                    byte[] value)
This is the metodh invoked when a value is decided by this process

Parameters:
round - Round at which the decision is made
value - The decided value (got from WEAK or STRONG messages)
